p: Coadministration of MPOE with CCl 4 significantly improved the liver histopathology ( Figure 2) and reduced the fibrotic changes ( Figure 3, Table 5). Furthermore, the MPOE-treated group showed a marked reduction in both Î±-SMA- and desmin-immunopositive cells (Figures 4(c) and 5(c)). These data reflect the efficacy of MPOE to reduce the hepatocellular toxic effects of CCl 4 and to suppress HSCs activation and proliferation as well.
